FuncDef: This command specifies a log ID destination. This parameter is mandatory when configuring a log destination. This command instructs the events selected for the log ID to be directed to a memory log. A memory file is a circular buffer. Once the file is full, each new entry replaces the oldest entry in the log.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the number of events that can be stored in the memory. Values-50 to 3000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
